extendedInfo.description: -= WE FINALLY HAVE ENOUGH USERS THAT OUR HOST IS RESPONDING A LITTLE SLOWER THAN USUAL. WE ARE IN THE PROCESS OF FINALIZING A TRANSITION TO A BETTER PACKAGE WHILE MAINTAINING A FREE PRODUCT =-  :D THANKS everyone for your help. Thank you Richard Watson for alerting us to the latency!This Tarot game has been a somewhat long but very rewarding journey. We have spent days at a time; pouring over the old works of Alchemy, Quabbalah, Ceremonial Magick, ancient Hebrew, Sumerian, Babylonian, Gnostic/Christian, and much more. We have established a Database and API to rival the holdings of Dr. Hall. We have searched the depths of Jung, Crowley, Waite, Blatvatsky, Cooper, Mathers, and many more.We hope our game amuses and puzzles you. We have given our best to make sure small things like the double zodiac of the Thoth deck, and the ramblings of a Madman that Tzaddi is, indeed, not The Star have been accounted for. We offer the uncorrected waite deck, three and celtic cross spreads for free. We will soon launch the Thoth deck, and Golden Dawn spread when we have finished the coding for the dignities of the triplets in the GD spread.-= We are currently working on the release of the Thoth/Crowley Deck, the Golden Dawn Spread, and the Necromancers table background for in-app purchase =-

reviews.title: Looks great, but....
reviews.comment: Constantly shuffles the deck to infinity. App will not let me do anything.
reviews.author: Richard Watson

reviews.title: Stuck
reviews.comment: It\'s stuck on shuffling can only change menu.but nothing happens after that except shuffling :( please help
reviews.author: Charlotte Hernandez

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app due to it\'s 5 star rating....everytime I would try to use it ...it would close continuously.  So I can only give it one star due to that.  Shame. :(
reviews.author: Luna Moon

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This has to be the single best tarot game available on the market. Can\'t wait to what\'s next.
reviews.author: Robert Ogle

reviews.title: Very Amazing
reviews.comment: I have to say this is one of the best apps out there. It\'s almost like using the cards but not having to carry a deck with you everywhere. I can\'t wait till it get\'s more options such as decks and what ever else they come up with! Good Job!
reviews.author: Frater Unipheas

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: I was so excited to see this not being one of tho run of the mill card aps amazing graphics!
reviews.author: Stacey Harrison

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is an excellent Tarot game. Easy to navigate and great detail. Good job guys!
reviews.author: Bill M

reviews.title: Excellent!!
reviews.comment: This is a great app ! Awesome artwork. The animations are great. Text needs some formatting.
reviews.author: Casey Davis

reviews.title: Hmm...
reviews.comment: Not sure what the deal is but menu item text is skewed and app crashes when clicking any menu selection. Samsung Optimus net.
reviews.author: Christia Hall
